body: Lol thats a shame he the daddy

This woman basically fucked every male character in the series, and by stroke of luck the child turns out to be the main guy’s. I just google translated a few parts. He’s willing to accept her children no matter who the father is and he’s just lucky, or unlucky depending on how you look at it, he’s the father. Such a forgiving guy, I mean she’s fucked all his friends, her boss, coworkers, doctor, and so many more. And many times she’s the one who approached those dudes. And she has the gall to be upset he barely had sex with another woman once.
